name: A/B Test Subject Lines
description: Test two subject line variants to optimize opens

steps.title: Create A/B Test
steps.prompt:
Create an A/B test for subject lines:
Variant A: 'Last Chance - Sale Ends Tonight!'
Variant B: 'Don't Miss Out: Final Hours of Sale'
Test 20% of audience, send winner based on open rate after 4 hours
Send to segment active_customers

steps.title: Check Results (After 4+ Hours)
steps.prompt: Show me results for the A/B test
steps.notes: Winner automatically sent to remaining 80% after test period
